interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Replacement Toothbrush Heads Compatible With Oral B Braun Electric Toothbrush, 4 Count
Review Date: 2019/06/25
Store: HDY
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'HDY', 'Size': '4 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Extra Soft', 'Number of Pieces': '4', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.43 x 0.39 x 2.76 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '632088377561', 'Manufacturer': 'HDY'}
Review Text: After buying name brand toothbrushes for years I was skeptical to try an off brand. So far both my husband and I are impressed with the quality of these brushes. They are firmer than the name brand brush but that is good because the brand brushes splay out the bristles long before the 3 month recommended change time. He tried this brush first and commented that his teeth felt so much cleaner, when I brushed later I agreed with his reaction. These come 4 in a package with color rings attached. The brushes are not individually wrapped so the extras went into a plastic bag for clean storage.
Review Title: Terrific Value
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Osensia Silver Conditioner for Brassy Hair - Toning Purple Conditioner - Paraben Free Blonde Treatment for Highlights, Platinum, Bleached, and Gray Hair - Grape Seed Hydrates and Brightens Color
Osensia
{'Brand': 'Osensia', 'Item Form': 'conditioner', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Oily, Color Treated, bleached, Dry, Normal', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 2.2 x 2.2 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '039853185725'}
My hair is professionally colored monthly and I still have problems with oxidation resulting in brassiness. I began using this conditioner shortly after my hair was colored in November and I just went for a touch up and got feed back from my stylist. While I thought the color had less brassiness I wanted her professional opinion. Without prompting she said my hair looked great (except for the roots) and asked what I had been doing different. The silver conditioner was my response. My husband, who is totally white haired also has been using the conditioner once per week. To keep the yellow out of his hair he shampoos and conditions purple once a week and this has been a positive addition to his routine. Be careful not to over use this product because the results will be undesirable.
Reduces Oxidation and Brassiness

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus**: Strong interest in products that address hair color treatment, especially solutions for brassiness in professionally colored hair.

- **Product Preference**: Values paraben-free formulas and specific toning agents that help maintain color vibrancy, indicating a health-conscious choice for personal care. Shows an openness to trying off-brand products if they meet quality standards.

- **Oral Care Interest**: Recently demonstrated a preference for high-quality, effective oral care products, particularly replacement toothbrush heads that provide superior cleaning compared to name brands.

- **Routine & Usage**: Incorporates specialized conditioners into regular hair maintenance, with a tendency to use targeted treatments post-coloring to combat oxidation. Also values regular replacement of toothbrush heads for optimal oral health.

- **Feedback-Oriented**: Seeks professional validation for product effectiveness, highlighting the importance of stylist input in decision-making, as well as relying on spousal feedback regarding product satisfaction.

- **Shared Usage**: Engages family, as indicated by the husband's use of similar products for maintaining his gray hair, and recently shared positive experiences with oral care products that he also uses.

- **Caution with Usage**: Awareness of product application guidelines, avoiding overuse to prevent adverse effects, reflecting a conscientious approach towards both hair and oral care.

Overall, this user maintains a trend toward specialized health-conscious personal care products, whether in hair care or oral hygiene, emphasizing quality and expert recommendations.
